titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Rules and Administration.

action.text: Committee on Rules and Administration. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Blunt. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 9.

term.name: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration

bill.summary: 1/29/2015--Reported to Senate without amendment. Authorizes expenditures by the Senate Committee on Rules and Administration for the 114th Congress.
